original_text: And Jesus said to his disciples, “Truly, I say to you, only with difficulty will a rich person enter the kingdom of heaven.
korean_text: 예수께서 제자들에게 이르시되 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 부자는 천국에 들어가기가 어려우니라

sentences.original_text: And Jesus said to his disciples,
only with difficulty will a rich person enter the kingdom of heaven.
sentences.korean_translation: 부자가 하늘 나라에 들어가는 것은 매우 어렵다.
